name: 2022 The 6th International Conference on Materials Sciences and Nanomaterials
content: Publicationï¼š The registered and presented papers will be published into Materials Science Forum (ISSN print 0255-5476 / ISSN web 1662-9752), which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, Chemical Abstracts Service (CAS), REAXYS, Chimica, etc. Special Issue: Extended papers can be recommended for potential publication in Nanomaterials (ISSN 2079-4991). Impact factor: 4.324 Indexing: Scopus, SCIE (Web of Science), PubMed, PMC, CAPlus / SciFinder, Inspec, and many other databases.
